originalText.text: I had such an amazing experience with the fitness professionals at 4U Fitness! Richard is such an amazing trainer, he pushes you to improve in every aspect of life to get the goals you desire.  I want to gain muscle and tone, he gave me all the tools to make it happen. By teaching me how to properly exercise and what kind of foods I should be eating he has set me up for success. Thank you 4U Fitness Team!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

originalText.text: Truly The best at what they do!!! A company who genuinely cares about their clients!! Which is one of the things I find very rare these days. Their coaches go above and beyond for you! Not only do they customize a personal program for you to help you reach your goals, but they specialize in educating you on how to sustain those goals after your journey with them is over! Also, the fact that you can get the equivalent of an hour & a half workout and be in & out of the studio in 30 minutes is truly only a bonus! The nutritional guidance, constant check ins, recipes emailed, even birthday/anniversary gifts given, are the little things that make this gym so very special. The client experience I have at 4U Fitness is almost like being treated as royalty. You won’t find any other gym or health coach that will do what 4U Fitness does for you. Richard, is one of the most knowledgeable coaches I have ever had the pleasure of working with. He is driven not only by results, but safety & efficacy. If anyone knows the human body & how it works best, it is totally him!!!! I wish I could give this studio 100 stars, because it is truly what it deserves!!!

originalText.text: 4U Fitness - New York is amazing! Nina has been so helpful and motivating! In a little less than a month I am down 4 inches and have lost 3% body fat! The workouts are always different- never boring. What I love most about 4U Fitness is that they take the time to get to know you and make adjustments to your workouts and make suggestions for your diet based on that as well. 4U Fitness is the place to go if you want a place to workout that is supportive and can really make a difference!!!

text.text: 4U Fitness - New York is amazing! Nina has been so helpful and motivating! In a little less than a month I am down 4 inches and have lost 3% body fat! The workouts are always different- never boring. What I love most about 4U Fitness is that they take the time to get to know you and make adjustments to your workouts and make suggestions for your diet based on that as well. 4U Fitness is the place to go if you want a place to workout that is supportive and can really make a difference!!!

originalText.text: 4U fitness if FOR YOU if you are looking for the most supportive environment in which to achieve your goals and see results. Nina is an absolutely amazing trainer, but it is her enthusiasm and full range of nutritional support that makes the difference. At first I was not sure I believed that I could attain results in these short workouts and I have been shocked by my progress. This gym is perfect for those who are short on time but want to be in the best shape of their life, and the emphasis on health and the benefits of a healthy lifestyle and exercise program set 4U fitness apart from any other gym or program I have ever done. Furthermore, Nina and Dan are two of the nicest people I have ever met. Their main focus is on ending the obesity epidemic and their dedication to the greater good shines in everything they do. I can not recommend this place enough!

originalText.text: What a great workout experience! This system is amazing and you can exercise and get stronger within a shorter period of time than when going to the gym. The team in NYC is excellent! Amazing energy, very dynamic and attentive to details! I really love the experience with them and I will continue my bi-weekly sessions with Richard who is always motivating me and helping me to improve and get stronger! #Thanks4UFitness
